projectName.title: Project name
projectName.formPlaceholder: Enter the name of your project

previousVersions.title: Have you previously registered a version(s) of your project with OSHWA?
previousVersions.formPlaceholder: Enter the OSHWA UID of a previous version
previousVersions.instructions: If you have previously registered a version(s) of your project with OSHWA, type in the UID for that project

projectDescription.title: Project description
projectDescription.formPlaceholder: Provide a brief description of your project (500 characters)
projectDescription.instructions: Please limit your response to 500 characters

projectWebsite.title: Project website
projectWebsite.formPlaceholder: Enter a URL including the protocol (e.g https://example.com)
projectWebsite.instructions: Include the protocol to your URL (e.g. http:// or https://)

primaryType.title: Primary Project Type
primaryType.requiredErrorMessage: You must select a project type. If your project doesn't fall into any of these types, select "Other".
primaryType.instructions: If your project doesn't fall into any of these types, select "Other".

projectKeywords.title: Project Keywords
projectKeywords.instructions: If you would like your project to be searchable by specific keywords, add them here

documentationUrl.title: Where can the documentation be found for your project?
documentationUrl.formPlaceholder: Enter a URL including the protocol (e.g https://example.com)
documentationUrl.instructions: Include the protocol to your URL (e.g. http:// or https://)

availableFileFormat.title: All project documentation and design files are available in the preferred format for making changes.

citations.title: Does your project incorporate or build upon other open projects that are not currently certified by OSHWA? If so, use this space to cite those projects
citations.formPlaceholder: Enter a URL including the protocol (e.g https://example.com)
citations.instructions: Include the protocol to your URL (e.g. http:// or https://)
